cancellationPolicies.label: Free Cancellation rates
cancellationPolicies.description: If you cancel your booking before 23:59 12th Nov 2025 (AEST) your deposit will be refunded to your payment card. If you cancel after 23:59 12th Nov 2025 (AEST) or in the event of a no-show, your deposit will not be refunded and the total of the first night's accommodation will be charged to your payment card, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information). Please note that cancellations must be made directly within your booking in My Account.

privates.name: Standard Twin Room Private Shared Bathroom
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription:
Private room (bunk beds) for two people with air conditioning (share shower and bathroom located adjacent) Small fridge, tea/coffee making facilities, towels and linen provided. Set in beautiful tropical gardens.
Free WIFI in designated areas.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

privates.name: Standard 3 Bed Private Ensuite
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription:
Ensuite Triple room - for 3 people.
This Ensuite Triple has 3 single beds, ensuite bathroom, linen and towels provided. 
Smart TV.  Fully air conditioned. Small fridge and coffee/tea making facilities in the room.
Car parking available.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.
